attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the under-signed believe that the citizens of the United Kingdom whom have any such medical condition(s) which conventional medicine(s) or treatment(s) fail to treat effectively should be granted our justifiable right to be prescribed, grow, purchase, possess, and consume, medicinal marijuana and its derivatives for the relief of any such medical condition(s).

We wholeheartedly believe that as citizens of the United Kingdom we should be able to be prescribed, grow, purchase, and consume, medicinal marijuana and its derivatives for relief of any such medical condition(s) without fear of prosecution from the corporate Police services and Courts within the United Kingdom.

We vow to agree to the outlined terms if any consumer of medicinal marijuana has a genuine medical condition(s) which will benefit from the treatment and consumption of medicinal marijuana or its derivates which conventional prophylactic medicine(s) or treatment(s) fail to manage or treat effectively.
